text: FIFA Football 2003 is a 2002 association football simulation video game in Electronic Arts' FIFA series created by EA Canada and published by Electronic Arts. It was released for the Playstation, Playstation 2, Xbox, GameCube, Game Boy Advance and Microsoft Windows. title: FIFA Football 2003
